frontmatter.title: Application Notes on APD Areametric App: Automated area quantification for both Android and iOS
frontmatter.description: Area measurements have a wide range of uses from the monitoring of skin features in healthcare, celestial bodies in astronomy, to determining furniture sizes in everyday indoor uses. Current measurement methods utilize some form of measuring tool and unless performed by skilled and trained professionals, human errors leading to inaccurate measurements can often arise.
